a condition in which the inside of the ear becomes swollen and painful: It is important to have your pet seen for otitis as it can result in a burst eardrum and deafness if not treated. Malignant otitis requires the use of systemic antibiotics for nearly two months.
More examplesFewer examplesOtitis is inflammation of the ear.A follow-up visit should be scheduled in 2 weeks to check if the otitis has resolved.The spinous ear tick may induce otitis in dogs.
